short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate a name according to the Plex naming convention

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
While on supported sites, an extra line with the generated name will appear. Clicking on it will copy it to your clipboard for convenience.
Currently supporting IMDB, TheTVDB, and TheMovieDB.
